name: North Oakland Senior Center
short_desc: Senior center providing outreach, services, support, recreation and information and referral to community resources
description: A senior center providing outreach, services, support, information and referral to community resources. A hot meal is served at noon, Monday through Friday, for a $3.50 donation. Phone one day ahead for lunch reservations.Also sponsors special events and preventive health screening. Daily classes, workshops and social recreational activities are scheduled. Publishes a newsletter, "North Oakland Senior Times."Cooling center is open when temperatures are extreme. Call 510-597-5085 for more information.
